page.title: 10My School Day
page.content: First thing I know on a Thursday morning is the alarm ringing.I get up, dress and eat my breakfast.I hate breakfast but my mum usually makes me eat something.At school,before the bell rings,we catch up with the latest news and then squash each other in the scramble in the cloakroom.We go swimming on Thursday but before we go we read.Are swimming teacher works us very hard and I am usually whacked when I get back to school.The rest of the day is spent doing normal work like english art or topic work. I like them all.When the bell goes at 3.30 I am sad because I never get bored at school.When I get home I practice on the piano and then go to piano lesson.I don't really mind going but it does get a bit boring at times.
